abstract: The Tribune Company has hired investment banks to pursue a sale of its top newspapers, including The Chicago Tribune and The Los Angeles Times.
snippet: The Tribune Company has hired investment banks to pursue a sale of its top newspapers, including The Chicago Tribune and The Los Angeles Times.

headline.main: Tribune Hires Investment Banks to Weigh a Sale of Its Top Newspapers
headline.print_headline: Tribune Company Hires Investment Banks to Weigh a Sale of Its Top Newspapers

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
